project_descr: Stimulate good governance and economic activity, promote social inclusion at the local level through integrated local development

outputs.output_descr: The project directly contributes to improvements in the standard of living for more than 100,000 people in BiH, working with domestic authorities to put into place mechanisms and resources needed to drive social and economic development.
